verbose_text: As the initiation step, viral glycoprotein gp120 interacts with CD4, which in turn triggers the binding of gp120 's V3 loop to the N-terminus, ECL2, ECL3 and the ligand binding cavity of CXCR4 XREF_BIBR.
evidence: CD4, which in turn triggers the binding of gp120's V3 loop to the N-terminus, ECL2, ECL3
